name: Kobe Bryant
description: 6'6" shooting guard, Mamba mentality. 5 championships, 1 MVP, 18x All-Star. Relentless work ethic, killer instinct, fadeaway maestro.

mamba-face.name: Mamba Face
mamba-face.description: The death stare - cold, calculating, about to destroy
mamba-face.expression: ice cold killer, no emotion, locked in
mamba-face.prompt: intense death stare at opponent or camera - jaw set, eyes showing zero emotion, complete focus and killer instinct, the Mamba face that preceded destruction, predator locked onto prey

fadeaway-baseline.name: Baseline Fadeaway
fadeaway-baseline.expression: confident mastery, this is my shot
fadeaway-baseline.prompt: executing baseline fadeaway jumper - body fading toward sideline, shooting arm extended with perfect form, shot over outstretched defender's hand, the shot he practiced a million times

jersey-bite.name: Jersey Bite
jersey-bite.description: Biting jersey in frustration or intensity
jersey-bite.prompt: biting bottom of jersey - head tilted down, jersey pulled up to mouth, channeling intensity or frustration into focus, the Mamba processing and preparing

fist-pump-scream.name: And One Scream
fist-pump-scream.description: Screaming after and-one finish through contact
fist-pump-scream.prompt: screaming celebration after and-one - fist clenched, veins visible, mouth open in primal scream, just finished through heavy contact, releasing all the intensity

game-winner-follow.name: Game Winner Celebration
game-winner-follow.description: Running away after game-winner, arms out
game-winner-follow.expression: triumphant release, living for these moments
game-winner-follow.prompt: running away from basket after hitting game-winner - arms spread to sides, looking back at basket or crowd, teammates chasing to celebrate, living for the clutch moments
game-winner-follow.energy: clutch gene, made for the moment

achilles-walk-off.name: Achilles Walk-Off
achilles-walk-off.description: Walking off after hitting free throws on torn Achilles
achilles-walk-off.prompt: limping off court with determined expression - injured but having just hit clutch free throws, refusing help, walking off on his own terms, warrior spirit even in defeat
